title: Patch Notes
content: tore previous mod name if the mod hasn't been saved after renaming. Fixed the 'Render Equipment Icons' process in the Toolkit sometimes causing a deadlock. If you override an item's parent value in the Stats Editor via the Sidebar, you'll now see the orange diamond icon, as expected, indicating that the value has been overridden. The Project Browser will no longer generate a crash dump if there was no crash and you closed the Project Browser window normally. Disabled the 'Save' button in the Pro
